steps.title: Homepage
steps.content: On this page you can see log of user actions as well as manage your favourite links (Every user has it's own links.).

steps.title: Structures and pages
steps.content: Section for managing structures and pages of the system.

steps.title: Roles
steps.content: There you can define user roles.

steps.title: Languages
steps.content: There you can manage system languages.

steps.title: Translations
steps.content: There you can translate static texts.

steps.title: Cloning of languages
steps.content: There you can you can create new language from another one.

steps.title: Translator
steps.content: Translator is used for automatic translations of text.

steps.title: Basic settings
steps.content: There you can manage basic system settings.

steps.title: Pictures settings
steps.content: There you can manage settings of the pictures.

steps.title: Emails settings
steps.content: There you can manages emails settings.

steps.title: Boxes settings
steps.content: There you can manage boxes settings.

steps.title: Seo settings
steps.content: There you can manage SEO settings.

steps.title: Project settings
steps.content: There you can manage project specific settings.
